body: See above comment, but I also want to note that this placement-new isn't even right: `cpu_engine` previously contained a valid mt19937_64 engine and you have to placement-delete it first before you reuse the memory for something else.
body_html: See above comment, but I also want to note that this placement-new isn't even right: cpu_engine previously contained a valid mt19937_64 engine and you have to placement-delete it first before you reuse the memory for something else.
body_text: See above comment, but I also want to note that this placement-new isn't even right: cpu_engine previously contained a valid mt19937_64 engine and you have to placement-delete it first before you reuse the memory for something else.
